description:
Whitelotus Corporation is a leading Mobile application development company based in India with customer base from US, UK, Canada, Australia, France, Portugal, Germany, Sweden, Singapore, UAE, Oman and other Middle East countries.
We envision ourselves to see as leaders of tomorrow by our continuous dedication and spirit to work for the global clients.
Our Vision is to "To see our organization accredited as world’s most valued and professional IT service provider by preserving our value system, integrity with innovation and quality services".
Our major services includes Mobile Application Development for the enterprise business. We are expert with the iPhone Application Development, iPad Application Development, Android Application Development. We have excellent knowledge of developing and deployment of Enterprise applications for iOS and Android.
We have profound knowledge on using the latest iBeacon technology and have developed successfull products for our clients using BLE devices like beacons.
Other featured service includes Website design and Development using open sources solutions like PHP, content management systems like Joomla, Drupal, Wordpress, Magento and osCommerce.
Internet Marketing and Search Engine Optimization is also included as our premium service through which we will serve global customers to achieve their dream of seeing their website on the top rankings on major search engines so that tangible outcome in terms of revenue and more inquires is observed.
Our mission is to “See Growth and Give Growth” by serving the society as well as different sectoral industries by our services.
